text: István Szatmári (born 23 May 1997) is a Hungarian football player. He plays for Gyirmót FC Győr. ==Club career== He made his Nemzeti Bajnokság I debut for MTK Budapest on 31 May 2015 in a game against Diósgyőr. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3"|MTK Budapest II |2015–16 |rowspan="2"|Nemzeti Bajnokság III |25||8||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||25||8 |- |2016–17 |9||6||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||9||6 |- !colspan="2"|Total !34!!14!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!34!!14 |- |rowspan="2"|Zalaegerszeg |2016–17 |rowspan="1"|Nemzeti Bajnokság II |13||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||13||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !13!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!13!!0 |- |rowspan="3"|Békéscsaba |2017–18 |rowspan="2"|Nemzeti Bajnokság II |30||6||4||1||colspan="2"|—||0||0||34||7 |- |2018–19 |37||15||2||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||39||15 |- !colspan="2"|Total !67!!21!!6!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!73!!22 |- |rowspan="5"|MTK Budapest |2014–15 |rowspan="3"|Nemzeti Bajnokság I |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||1||0||2||0 |- |2015–16 |1||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||2||0 |- |2016–17 |10||0||3||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||13||0 |- |2019–20 |rowspan="1"|Nemzeti Bajnokság II |10||3||3||2||colspan="2"|—||0||0||13||5 |- !colspan="2"|Total !22!!3!!7!!2!!0!!0!!1!!0!!30!!5 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !136!!38!!13!!3!!0!!0!!0!!0!!150!!41 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Sportspeople from Miskolc Category:Living people Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungary youth international footballers Category:MTK Budapest FC players Category:Zalaegerszegi TE players Category:Békéscsaba 1912 Előre footballers Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Association football midfielders
